title: Ultra-rich women in Europe in 2014 , by personal fortune value
yAxis: Value of wealth in billion euros
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Value of wealth in billion euros in the y axis.
Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) has the highest Value of wealth in billion euros and Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany) has the lowest Value of wealth in billion euros.
The lowest value at Month Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany) is 5.84x times less than the highest value at Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France).
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Value of wealth in billion euros for 10 number of Months.
The Value of wealth in billion euros is highest at Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) and lowest at Month Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany).
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Value of wealth in billion euros in the y axis.
Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) has the highest Value of wealth in billion euros and Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany) has the lowest Value of wealth in billion euros.
The lowest value at Month Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany) is 5.84x times less than the highest value at Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France).
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Value of wealth in billion euros in each Month on the y axis.
Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) has the highest Value of wealth in billion euros and Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany) has the lowest Value of wealth in billion euros.
The difference of Value of wealth in billion euros between the highest and lowest Month is 20.8.
Value of wealth in billion euros at Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) is 25.1 , second place is  at 25.1, and thirdly is Johanna Quandt (BMW Germany) at 10.7.
Overall Value of wealth in billion euros has decreased over the Months.
Similar Value of wealth in billion euros is found in Month Margarita Louis Dreyfus (Louis Dreyfus Switzerland), and Antonia Axson Johnson (Axel Johnson Group Sweden).
The Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) has 2.89 times more Value of wealth in billion euros than average.
